rows.label: tev000891_MSG0001
rows.name: You look as bored as I feel, pard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000891_MSG0002
rows.name:
I never know what to do with myself when I'm not
on a damn job.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000891_MSG0003
rows.name: How do you spend your days off?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000891_JNK0010
rows.name: Working

rows.label: tev000891_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Yelv you never take breaks from BLADE work.

rows.label: tev000891_JNK0020
rows.name: Slacking

rows.label: tev000891_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Yelv you never leave the barracks on days off.

rows.label: tev000891_JNK0030
rows.name: Dating

rows.label: tev000891_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Yelv you spend your days off going on dates.

rows.label: tev000891_MSG0004
rows.name: Well, ain't you just a barrel of laughs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000891_MSG0005
rows.name:
Bein' a hard worker is fine, but if you don't take ANY
time off, you're takin' it way too far.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000891_MSG0006
rows.name: Hasn't Eleonora forced you to take time off yet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000891_MSG0007
rows.name:
She went off on me once for spendin' all my time on
Reclaimer missions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000891_MSG0008
rows.name: Talk about a waste of a vacation...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000891_MSG0009
rows.name:
Hey, that's right. You're livin' over there with Elma
and Lin. I bet they're fun to be around, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000891_MSG0010
rows.name:
Nothing wrong with spending a quiet day at home
when you're with friends or family.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000891_MSG0011
rows.name:
I certainly don't regret that aimless time I spent with...
Well, you know who.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000891_MSG0012
rows.name: Dates?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000891_MSG0013
rows.name: What the hell, [ST:playername ]?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000891_MSG0014
rows.name: Yeesh, I didn't realize we had a romantic in our midst.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000891_MSG0015
rows.name:
Who are you goin' out with? And where are they?
I gotta make sure they're up to my standards![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000891_MSG0016
rows.name: Wait a sec... You're pullin' my chain, ain't ya?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000891_MSG0017
rows.name:
Well, I guess that answers my question—you spend
your days off messin' with people's minds for no good
reason![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000891_MSG0019
rows.name:
Anyway, I got nothing but free time on my hands
today.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000891_MSG0020
rows.name:
I'm so bored, I'm pissing my day away with this bunch
of deadbeats.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000891_JNK0040
rows.name: Invite

rows.label: tev000891_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Yelv to join you at the diner.

rows.label: tev000891_JNK0050
rows.name: Advise

rows.label: tev000891_SEL0051
rows.name:
Suggest to Yelv that he go to bed
early to prepare for tomorrow.

rows.label: tev000891_MSG0021
rows.name:
That sounds about a million times more fun than what
I'm doin' right now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000891_MSG0022
rows.name:
Unfortunately, Eleonora told me I can't drink like I used
to no more.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000891_MSG0023
rows.name:
She says my Reclaimer work starts to suffer when I'm
hungover. ...Whatever![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000891_MSG0024
rows.name:
I've already had 10 drinks today, though, so I'd better
not push it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000891_MSG0025
rows.name:
But thanks for the invite—best thing that's happened
to me all day. We'll do it some other time, yeah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000891_MSG0026
rows.name: Geez, you wanna get off my back, [ST:gender p1=Dad p2=Mom ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000891_MSG0027
rows.name:
What kinda hypocrite goes around at this time of night
tellin' other people they ought to be in bed?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000891_MSG0028
rows.name:
If you want me to go to bed so bad, maybe you
oughta lead by example... 'Cause there's no goddamn
way I'm goin' home before you are![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000891_MSG0029
rows.name:
Still...I guess even when your body ain't tired,
your brain needs rest to stay screwed on straight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000891_MSG0030
rows.name:
So ya know what? I'm gonna take your advice and
meander on home. Hope you're happy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000891_MSG0031
rows.name:
Let's go cause some trouble outside the city next time
we see each other, yeah?[ST:wait ]
